titles.title: HP796 Lord of light, whose name shines brighter

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord of light, whose name shines brighter
Than all the stars and suns of space,
Deign to make us your co-workers
In the kingdom of your grace;
Use us to fulfil your purpose
In the gift of Christ your Son:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By the toil of lonely workers
In some far-outlying field,
By the courage where the radiance
Of the cross is still revealed,
By the victories of meekness
Through reproach and suffering won:

verse.name: v3
v4
c1
verse.lines:
Father, as in highest heaven,
So on earth your will be done.
